description:
Long-wearing, moisturizing, full-coverage cream-to-matte color in a range of statement-making nude shades for all skin tones.When it comes to the nude lip, there is no such thing as one-size-fits-all color. Formulated with moisturizing ingredients to counteract dryness, this matte liquid glides on silky smooth with a subtle vanilla scent.The flexible paddle applicator delivers full coverage in one sweep. Primer-infused: Gives a gorgeous soft focus effect, and helps with transfer resistance; helps prevent feathering/bleeding
Plant-based waxes: Moisturizing feel on lips

Benefits:

Full coverage
Long-wearing formula
Moisturizing, cream-to-matte finish
Lightweight, no-tack texture
Formulated without parabens, sulfates or phthalates
Gluten-free and not tested on animals
Formulated without petrolatum
Gen Nude was developed for all skin tones and lip tones, to be a playground of nude lip shades for everyone, from makeup novice to artist. Whether you want an edgy, blanked-out nude look, a natural your-lips-but-better nude, or a deeper neutral contrast color, you're guaranteed to find shades for any look. Blend and layer colors and finishes for infinite ways to go nude.

Sheer-to-medium coverage

description:
To learn more & see entire collection - Click here!
Prepare to get hooked. Vice Lipstick comes in a massive lineup of addictive shades and indulgent finishes - Urban Decay's biggest lineup yet!Vice has it all: Bold brights. Dark, sexy shades. Super-versatile neutrals. With so much variety it'll make your head spin, there's something for everyone - from new shades to cult favorites you thought you'd never see again.Urban Decay's huge assortment also includes more finishes than ever before:

Mega Matte (MM): super-intense matte
Comfort Matte (CM): the creamiest matte
Cream (C): the original: creamy luxury
Metallized (M): cream with a high level of pearl
Sheer (S): a punch of color with a sheer, shiny finish
Sheer Shimmer (SS): slightly transparent finish with floating pearl and a smooth texture

The pigment load in Vice Lipstick is insane! Just one swipe provides an unbelievable laydown of color. And every shade applies smoothly (without dragging or skipping), hugs lips, and feels amazing! Urban Decay's proprietary Pigment Infusion System gives the formula its super-creamy texture, rich payout and superior color dispersion.This creamy formula is loaded with nourishing ingredients. A yummy butter blend comforts, hydrates and enhances, leaving lips soft and conditioned, never dry. Aloe vera, jojoba, avocado and babassu oils nourish and soften lips. Illipe butter (derived from Malaysian illipe trees) provides long-lasting moisture. And vitamin C and vitamin E provide a hit of antioxidants.Vice Lipstick comes in a modernized, luxed-up version of Urban Decay's original lipstick case. And the shade-matched label (including the shade name and finish) makes it easy to find the right color within the depths of your bag.
title: Vice Lipstick

Plus Vitality Lip Flush 4-in-1 Reviver Lipstick Stains are packed with anti-aging anti-oxidants including vitamins A, C, E, acai, green tea and white tea to protect and ward off free-radicals all day long. description:
To learn more & see entire collection - Click here!
Prepare to get hooked. Vice Lipstick comes in a massive lineup of addictive shades and indulgent finishes - Urban Decay's biggest lineup yet!Vice has it all: Bold brights. Dark, sexy shades. Super-versatile neutrals. With so much variety it'll make your head spin, there's something for everyone - from new shades to cult favorites you thought you'd never see again.Urban Decay's huge assortment also includes more finishes than ever before:

Mega Matte (MM): super-intense matte
Comfort Matte (CM): the creamiest matte
Cream (C): the original: creamy luxury
Metallized (M): cream with a high level of pearl
Sheer (S): a punch of color with a sheer, shiny finish
Sheer Shimmer (SS): slightly transparent finish with floating pearl and a smooth texture

The pigment load in Vice Lipstick is insane! Just one swipe provides an unbelievable laydown of color. And every shade applies smoothly (without dragging or skipping), hugs lips, and feels amazing! Urban Decay's proprietary Pigment Infusion System gives the formula its super-creamy texture, rich payout and superior color dispersion.This creamy formula is loaded with nourishing ingredients. A yummy butter blend comforts, hydrates and enhances, leaving lips soft and conditioned, never dry. Aloe vera, jojoba, avocado and babassu oils nourish and soften lips. Illipe butter (derived from Malaysian illipe trees) provides long-lasting moisture. And vitamin C and vitamin E provide a hit of antioxidants.Vice Lipstick comes in a modernized, luxed-up version of Urban Decay's original lipstick case. And the shade-matched label (including the shade name and finish) makes it easy to find the right color within the depths of your bag.
title: Vice Lipstick Comfort Matte

description: Why did IT Cosmetics create this product: These ultra-hydrating gloss stains are infused with oils and butters for the most luxurious pillowing feeling on lips, without any of the stickiness or thickness of traditional lip glosses. The best part, these hydrating glosses are  infused with a stain for an all-day gorgeous flush of color that lasts!Who is it for: Anyone who wants a naturally pretty, hydrated, gorgeous lips. Anyone who wants the look of a lipgloss without the sticky tacky feeling of a traditional lipgloss. Anyone who wants to instantly relieve dryness while protecting lips with loving and nourishing ingredients. Anyone who wants the long lasting effect of a stain that doesn't dry out your lips.Why is it different: Get ready for your new favorite hydration lip therapy! Developed with plastic surgeons, IT Cosmetics Vitality Lip Blush Hydrating Lip Gloss Stains are infused with 9 butters and oils, plus collagen, peptides and hydrating hyaluronic acid. These lip gloss stains delivers high shine and rich pigment that glides on like a lightweight serum that instantly hydrates, repairs and protects lips with hydrating oils and butters for the most luxurious pillow-y feeling on lips, without any of the stickiness or tackiness of traditional lip glosses! All with the addition of a beautiful hydrated stain that lasts. This truly innovative formula drenches your lips in plum oil, cherry oil, shea butter, avocado oil, argan oil and jojoba that all work together to treat, hydrate, condition, and nourish your lips, minimizing the appearance of lip lines and wrinkles! description: Want a lip look that's anything but basic? Go from all-business to party-all-night in one swipe: Urban Decay's Vice Special Effects Long-Lasting Water-Resistant Lip Topcoat transforms any lip color from beautiful to beyond.Apply this shade-shifting topcoat over cream, metallized and matte shades of UD's Vice Lipstick or any Vice Liquid Lipstick to create a completely customized look...the world will be begging to know what you're wearing.Instantly morph your favorite colors and make it look like you spent hours crafting an Instagram-worthy lip look. Or wear these shades alone. Available in shimmer, glitter and metallic finishes, UD's innovative, comfortable, gel-cream formula dries down quickly and provides long-lasting wear that never feels sticky. Vice Special Effects not only lasts, but also creates a water-resistant barrier that seals in the color underneath and prevents it from moving around on your lips.Vice Special Effects comes in a clear tube (so you can see the shade inside) with gold accents. To set it apart from Vice Liquid Lipstick, UD gave it an iridescent white cap. The flexible brush applicator helps the formula glide on smoothly, without messing up any lipstick underneath.Marine Filling Spheres (rich in marine collagen) have moisturizing and skin-smoothing properties. And don't be surprised if your lips feel tingly just after applying this product; it's locking in the special effect!
title: Vice Special Effects Long-Lasting Water-Resistant Lip Topcoat

description:
To learn more & see entire collection - Click here!
Prepare to get hooked. Vice Lipstick comes in a massive lineup of addictive shades and indulgent finishes - Urban Decay's biggest lineup yet!Vice has it all: Bold brights. Dark, sexy shades. Super-versatile neutrals. With so much variety it'll make your head spin, there's something for everyone - from new shades to cult favorites you thought you'd never see again.Urban Decay's huge assortment also includes more finishes than ever before:

Mega Matte (MM): super-intense matte
Comfort Matte (CM): the creamiest matte
Cream (C): the original: creamy luxury
Metallized (M): cream with a high level of pearl
Sheer (S): a punch of color with a sheer, shiny finish
Sheer Shimmer (SS): slightly transparent finish with floating pearl and a smooth texture

The pigment load in Vice Lipstick is insane! Just one swipe provides an unbelievable laydown of color. And every shade applies smoothly (without dragging or skipping), hugs lips, and feels amazing! Urban Decay's proprietary Pigment Infusion System gives the formula its super-creamy texture, rich payout and superior color dispersion.This creamy formula is loaded with nourishing ingredients. A yummy butter blend comforts, hydrates and enhances, leaving lips soft and conditioned, never dry. Aloe vera, jojoba, avocado and babassu oils nourish and soften lips. Illipe butter (derived from Malaysian illipe trees) provides long-lasting moisture. And vitamin C and vitamin E provide a hit of antioxidants.Vice Lipstick comes in a modernized, luxed-up version of Urban Decay's original lipstick case. And the shade-matched label (including the shade name and finish) makes it easy to find the right color within the depths of your bag.
title: Vice Lipstick Metallized

description: This is Vice Liquid Lipstick by Urban Decay - a waterproof formula so life-proof, it's not going ANYWHERE until you take it off. (Just imagine the possibilities.) What makes Vice different? The high-tech formula provides longer-lasting wear with ZERO transfer. Like UD's original formula, Vice Liquid Lipstick lays down intensely pigmented color. And the comfortable, nondrying wear sets it apart from other liquid lipsticks.Choose from a huge range of shades and two finishes - comfort matte and metallized. From neutrals with a UD edge to the bold brights color junkies crave, there's something for everyone. The lineup includes everything from must-have colors from UD's Vice Lipstick range to limited-edition shades you begged to see again.Hot on the heels of the launch of UD's creamy, addictive Vice Lipstick formula, Wende decided to create a liquid lipstick that feels as good as it looks. This formula holds heavy loads of pearls and glitter, so the shade lineup ranges from shimmery to matte. Special technology in the formula allows the pearl to float on top, giving UD's metallized shades the maximum amount of shimmer.Vice Liquid Lipstick comes in a clear tube (so you can see the shade inside) with a metallized gunmetal cap and gold accents (reminiscent of UD's Vice Lipstick case). The extra long, flocked paddle applicator provides a nice, even laydown of color every time. The flat edge gives you complete coverage in one coat, while the tip allows for precision lining - perfect for areas like the corners of the lips and the cupid's bow.
title: Vice Liquid Lipstick Comfort Matte

description: Like a luxe gloss and a rich balm in one, Urban Decay's Naked Ultra Nourishing Lip Gloss is unlike ANY GLOSS you've ever tried. It not only looks and feels amazing, it's also really nourishing. And it has an addictively creamy texture and a gorgeous, high-gloss finish.Naked Ultra Nourishing Lip Gloss feels so luxe that you'll want to keep applying it all day - even when you don't need to. And it's the perfect gloss to complement the always-popular UD smoky eye. The makeup junkies at Urban Decay painstakingly crafted this formula, obsessing over every last detail until it was just right - and then they tweaked and perfected it some more!Even the firmly gloss averse will become hardcore addicts when they try Naked Ultra Nourishing Lip Gloss. It's laced with ingredients that are good for your skin - like Hyaluronic Filling Spheres, vitamin E, avocado oil and shea butter to hydrate and condition your lips. Rosehip seed oil provides an extra hit of vitamins, including vitamin A and vitamin C.In a clinical study of Naked Ultra Nourishing Lip Gloss:*86% of participants had a significant improvement in the appearance of lines and wrinkles.; 76% had a significant improvement in volume and hydration.; 86% said their lips felt nourished.The bottle is as luxe as the gloss inside! It has a gorgeous, highly metallized champagne cap and overshell with a cool "Naked" cutout effect. As pretty as it is, it's also practical. You can see the shade through the "Naked" cutout and the little window at the bottom (so it's easy to spot the right shade in your bag). And wait until you try the extra long, flocked paddle applicator. It picks up a generous amount of gloss and gives you a nice, even laydown of color.*Study reflects results immediately after use.
title: Naked Ultra Nourishing Lip Gloss
sub_title: Lovechild, Walk Of Shame, Beso, Nooner, Naked, Liar, Streak, Freestyle, Rule 34

description:
To learn more & see entire collection - Click here!
Prepare to get hooked. Vice Lipstick comes in a massive lineup of addictive shades and indulgent finishes - Urban Decay's biggest lineup yet!Vice has it all: Bold brights. Dark, sexy shades. Super-versatile neutrals. With so much variety it'll make your head spin, there's something for everyone - from new shades to cult favorites you thought you'd never see again.Urban Decay's huge assortment also includes more finishes than ever before:

Mega Matte (MM): super-intense matte
Comfort Matte (CM): the creamiest matte
Cream (C): the original: creamy luxury
Metallized (M): cream with a high level of pearl
Sheer (S): a punch of color with a sheer, shiny finish
Sheer Shimmer (SS): slightly transparent finish with floating pearl and a smooth texture

The pigment load in Vice Lipstick is insane! Just one swipe provides an unbelievable laydown of color. And every shade applies smoothly (without dragging or skipping), hugs lips, and feels amazing! Urban Decay's proprietary Pigment Infusion System gives the formula its super-creamy texture, rich payout and superior color dispersion.This creamy formula is loaded with nourishing ingredients. A yummy butter blend comforts, hydrates and enhances, leaving lips soft and conditioned, never dry. Aloe vera, jojoba, avocado and babassu oils nourish and soften lips. Illipe butter (derived from Malaysian illipe trees) provides long-lasting moisture. And vitamin C and vitamin E provide a hit of antioxidants.Vice Lipstick comes in a modernized, luxed-up version of Urban Decay's original lipstick case. And the shade-matched label (including the shade name and finish) makes it easy to find the right color within the depths of your bag.
title: Vice Lipstick Sheer

description:
To learn more & see entire collection - Click here!
Prepare to get hooked. Vice Lipstick comes in a massive lineup of addictive shades and indulgent finishes - Urban Decay's biggest lineup yet!Vice has it all: Bold brights. Dark, sexy shades. With so much variety it'll make your head spin, there's something for everyone - from new shades to cult favorites you thought you'd never see again.Urban Decay's huge assortment also includes more finishes than ever before:

Mega Matte (MM): super-intense matte
Comfort Matte (CM): the creamiest matte
Cream (C): the original: creamy luxury
Metallized (M): cream with a high level of pearl
Sheer (S): a punch of color with a sheer, shiny finish
Sheer Shimmer (SS): slightly transparent finish with floating pearl and a smooth texture

The pigment load in Vice Lipstick is insane! Just one swipe provides an unbelievable laydown of color. And every shade applies smoothly (without dragging or skipping), hugs lips, and feels amazing! Urban Decay's proprietary Pigment Infusion System gives the formula its super-creamy texture, rich payout and superior color dispersion.This creamy formula is loaded with nourishing ingredients. A yummy butter blend comforts, hydrates and enhances, leaving lips soft and conditioned, never dry. Aloe vera, jojoba, avocado and babassu oils nourish and soften lips. Illipe butter (derived from Malaysian illipe trees) provides long-lasting moisture. And vitamin C and vitamin E provide a hit of antioxidants.Vice Lipstick comes in a modernized, luxed-up version of Urban Decay's original lipstick case. And the shade-matched label (including the shade name and finish) makes it easy to find the right color within the depths of your bag.

description: This is Vice Liquid Lipstick by Urban Decay - a waterproof formula so life-proof, it's not going ANYWHERE until you take it off. (Just imagine the possibilities.) What makes Vice different? The high-tech formula provides longer-lasting wear with ZERO transfer. Like UD's original formula, Vice Liquid Lipstick lays down intensely pigmented color. And the comfortable, nondrying wear sets it apart from other liquid lipsticks.Choose from a huge range of shades and two finishes - comfort matte and metallized. From neutrals with a UD edge to the bold brights color junkies crave, there's something for everyone. The lineup includes everything from must-have colors from UD's Vice Lipstick range to limited-edition shades you begged to see again.Hot on the heels of the launch of UD's creamy, addictive Vice Lipstick formula, Wende decided to create a liquid lipstick that feels as good as it looks. This formula holds heavy loads of pearls and glitter, so the shade lineup ranges from shimmery to matte. Special technology in the formula allows the pearl to float on top, giving UD's metallized shades the maximum amount of shimmer.Vice Liquid Lipstick comes in a clear tube (so you can see the shade inside) with a metallized gunmetal cap and gold accents (reminiscent of UD's Vice Lipstick case). The extra long, flocked paddle applicator provides a nice, even laydown of color every time. The flat edge gives you complete coverage in one coat, while the tip allows for precision lining - perfect for areas like the corners of the lips and the cupid's bow.

description:
To learn more & see entire collection - Click here!
Prepare to get hooked. Vice Lipstick comes in a massive lineup of addictive shades and indulgent finishes - Urban Decay's biggest lineup yet!Vice has it all: Bold brights. Dark, sexy shades. Super-versatile neutrals. With so much variety it'll make your head spin, there's something for everyone - from new shades to cult favorites you thought you'd never see again.Urban Decay's huge assortment also includes more finishes than ever before:

Mega Matte (MM): super-intense matte
Comfort Matte (CM): the creamiest matte
Cream (C): the original: creamy luxury
Metallized (M): cream with a high level of pearl
Sheer (S): a punch of color with a sheer, shiny finish
Sheer Shimmer (SS): slightly transparent finish with floating pearl and a smooth texture

The pigment load in Vice Lipstick is insane! Just one swipe provides an unbelievable laydown of color. And every shade applies smoothly (without dragging or skipping), hugs lips, and feels amazing! Urban Decay's proprietary Pigment Infusion System gives the formula its super-creamy texture, rich payout and superior color dispersion.This creamy formula is loaded with nourishing ingredients. A yummy butter blend comforts, hydrates and enhances, leaving lips soft and conditioned, never dry. Aloe vera, jojoba, avocado and babassu oils nourish and soften lips. Illipe butter (derived from Malaysian illipe trees) provides long-lasting moisture. And vitamin C and vitamin E provide a hit of antioxidants.Vice Lipstick comes in a modernized, luxed-up version of Urban Decay's original lipstick case. And the shade-matched label (including the shade name and finish) makes it easy to find the right color within the depths of your bag.
title: Vice Lipstick Mega Matte

description: Replenish overworked lips and get them ready for action again with Urban Decay's Rehab Makeup Prep Lip Love. This super-luxe, moisturizing balm hydrates and soothes dry lips, so they're soft, smooth and practically irresistible.UD's whipped, oil-based formula really hugs lips to seal in moisture, leaving them dangerously kissable. And Lip Love has a bouncy, smooth, comfortable texture that feels great on your lips.In a clinical study, immediately after use:*96% of participants said that the condition of their lips had improved.; 98% said that Lip Love moisturized their lips and made them feel smoother.; 100% said their lips felt softer.*Based on a 51-subject consumer questionnaire.Your new favorite go-to balm, Lip Love contains a conditioning blend of shea butter and coconut oil, and has an addictive coconut-mint flavor that will keep you coming back for more. And the formula leaves your breath feeling fresh - an added bonus.While you probably wouldn't dream of forgoing moisturizer, your lips need love too! Like the rest of UD's Rehab Makeup Prep lineup, this balm provides instant results to get your skin ready for makeup. Long-lasting lip products can dry out your lips, but Lip Love hydrates and replenishes, leaving them soft and smooth. This is the balm you¿ll reach for when your lips need TLC. Perfect for use pre-bedtime, Lip Love lasts and doesn't smear off. You can also apply a light coat prior to applying your makeup. The easy-to-use squeeze tube has a slanted tip applicator for the perfect laydown of moisture and hydration.
title: Rehab Makeup Prep Lip Love

description: "This is one of the of the best kept secrets you'll love! Our News Anchor Blue shade goes on completely clear on your lips but it's infused with blue micro-crystals that counteract yellow in your teeth and give you and brighter, whiter smile! It's derived from an old news anchor secret where we used to mix blue eyeshadow with clear gloss and wore it over lipstick for a whiter looking smile on air!" Jamie Kern Lima, Co-FounderWhy did IT Cosmetics create this product: These ultra-hydrating glosses are infused with oils and butters for the most luxurious pillowing feeling on lips, without any of the stickiness or thickness of traditional lip glosses.What is it: Vitality Lip Flush Butter Glosses are the crème-de-la-crème of lip glosses! The formulation delivers high shine and rich pigment that glides on like a lightweight serum that instantly hydrates, repairs and protects lips. This truly innovative formula drenches your lips in butters and oils that work together to treat, hydrate, condition, and nourish your lips, minimizing the appearance of lip lines! Plus Vitality Lip Flush Butter Glosses are packed with anti-aging peptides, hyaluronic acid, collagen, and anti-oxidants including vitamins A, C, E, acai, green tea and white tea to protect and ward off free-radicals all day long.Who is it for: Anyone who wants a naturally pretty, hydrated, gorgeous lips. Anyone who wants the look of a lipgloss without the sticky tacky feeling of a traditional lipgloss. Anyone who wants to instantly relieve dryness while protecting lips with loving and nourishing ingredients.Why is it different: Vitality Lip Flush Butter Glosses are a super-hydrating lip glosses, infused with butters, oils and an anti-aging lip serum all in one! The formulation delivers high shine and rich pigment that glides on like a lightweight serum that instantly hydrates, repairs and protects lips. This truly innovative formula drenches your lips in collagen, hyaluronic acid, peptides, plum oil, cherry oil, shea butter, avocado oil, argan oil and Jojoba which work together to treat, hydrate, condition, and nourish your lips, minimizing the appearance of lip lines and wrinkles! Plus Vitality Lip Butter Gloss is packed with anti-aging anti-oxidants including vitamins A, C, E, acai, green tea and white tea to protect and ward off free-radicals all day long.Paraben free, cruelty free.
